title: Osho_Be Still And Know (10 files)
description:
Be Still and Know
Responses to Disciples Questions
Talks given from 01/09/79 am to 10/09/79 am
English Discourse series
10 Chapters
Year published: 1981 

In this collection there are short videos with questions nr. 2 
Someone did it like this for sharing.. I am just forwarding it.
Complete audio collection you can free download from oshoworld(dot)com

In official text on Cd there is a change of name BHAGWAN to OSHO..
but you will still hear "Bhagwan" in video. These videos and audios are still original, non-edited.

#01   Question 2:

OSHO, CAN BUDDHA OR CHRIST BE CREATED OR DEVELOPED OUT OF
EVERY COMMON HUMAN BEING? OR IS BUDDHA OR CHRIST ONLY BORN
AS SUCH? EVERY MAN IS BUDDHA, EVERY MAN IS CHRIST: I FEEL IT IS NOT TRUE.

Bal Krishna Bharti,...
........................................
#02   Question 2:

OSHO, IS IT ABSOLUTELY INEVITABLE THAT A BUDDHA WILL ALWAYS BE
MISUNDERSTOOD?

Prem Madira,...
................................

#03   Question 2:

OSHO,

WHAT IS TRUE WISDOM?

Prem Samadhi,...

..........................................
#05    Question 2:  

OSHO, IS LIFE NOT SOMETIMES FAR MORE SURPRISING THAN FICTIONS THEMSELVES?

Praghosh,
........................................
#06    Question 2:

OSHO, WHY DON'T YOU GIVE YOUR DISCIPLES A CERTAIN MODE OF
CONDUCT? ISN'T A MORAL CHARACTER NECESSARY FOR A SPIRITUAL LIFE?

Mahendra Singh,....
........................................
#07    Question 2:

OSHO,

I HAVE BEEN SO MUCH CONDITIONED AS A CATHOLIC THAT I SEE
NO HOPE FOR MYSELF: CAN YOU STILL HELP ME?

Maria,...
...................................
#08    Question 2:

OSHO,

WHAT IS HELL? IS THERE REALLY SUCH A PLACE?
..................................
#09    Question 2:

OSHO,

WHEN HEARING THE STORY OVER DINNER OF DADU AND TWO OF
HIS DISCIPLES, RAJJAB AND SUNDERO. I WAS BAFFLED BY HOW DEEPLY
AFFECTED THEY BOTH WERE BY THE DEATH OF THEIR MASTER. ONE,
RAJJAB, NEVER OPENED HIS EYES AGAIN, AND THE OTHER, SUNDERO,
DIED IN THE SAME BED AS HIS MASTER, DADU. HOW CAN AN
ENLIGHTENED PERSON BE SO AFFECTED BY THE DEATH OF HIS MASTER
OR BELOVED ONE?

Ambubhai Diwanji,...
.............................................
#10        Question 2:

OSHO,

WHAT EXACTLY DO YOU MEAN BY SAYING "BE STILL AND KNOW"
AND ALSO "SEEK THE STRENGTH OF NO-DESIRE"?

BE STILL AND KNOW is one of the most fundamental sutras of the inner alchemy
